Package org.t2health.qa

Class Summary
Answer A simple class designed to hold the data necessary for a question.
AnswerAdapter A simple adapter to display an array of answers.
AverageQAManagerActivity A QA manager who's job is to average the answer values using the total selected answers as a base.
BaseQAManagerActivity A base class for managing a questionare loaded from an XML file.
BaseQAQuestionActivity Base activity for displaying a question and its possible answers.
Question A simple object designed to hold the basic data parsed from the XML file.
Questionare A questionare object to hold the basic data parsed from the XML file.
QuestionResultsAdapter Used to who a list of the questions answered and the user-generated answers associated with them.
SimpleQAManagerActivity A simple implementation of a QAManager.
SingleChoiceQuestionActivity A question activity to handle a single answer choice.
SumQAManagerActivity A QA Manager that will sum the values of all the answers selected.
